meanings.definition: The property of certain crystals to generate an electric charge in response to applied mechanical stress.
meanings.sent1: Piezoelectricity in crystals creates electricity when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study piezoelectricity in crystals to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: The crystal's piezoelectricity made it light up when pressed, like magic!
meanings.sent4: The concept of piezoelectricity is as illuminating as a light bulb moment.
meanings.sent5: The demonstration of piezoelectricity was truly electrifying.

meanings.definition: The production of an electric charge in certain materials when subjected to mechanical pressure.
meanings.sent1: When pressure is applied, piezoelectricity generates electricity in materials.
meanings.sent2: Piezoelectricity is used in sensors to detect pressure changes.
meanings.sent3: The toy's piezoelectricity made it light up when squeezed, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The power of piezoelectricity can be harnessed for various applications.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of piezoelectricity revolutionized the field of material science.
